definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: Pakistan"s Chief of Army Staff Gen Ashfaq Parvez Kayani was also present during the ceremony."
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦陸軍總參謀長也出席了授獎儀式。

sentences.english: It ' s the joint chief - of - staff , sir.
sentences.chinese: 是，參謀長聯席會議主席，先生。

sentences.english: Having said that, there are going to be tensions within the Democratic caucus, " said Harold M. Ickes, deputy chief of staff under President Clinton.
sentences.chinese: 克林頓手下的一名參謀長這樣說。

sentences.english: That sort of controversial rhetoric recently led to Tamogami's ouster as the air force chief of staff.
sentences.chinese: 充滿爭議的措辭使得他近日被黜免空軍參謀長的職位。

sentences.english: He also met with Pakistan's army chief, General Ashfaq Kayani.
sentences.chinese: 他還同巴基斯坦軍隊總參謀長卡亞尼將軍舉行了會晤。

sentences.english: The rest of the Joint Chiefs were with the chairman.
sentences.chinese: 其他參謀長都同意鮑威爾主席的意見。

sentences.english: Mr Gaubert was Mr Sarkozy's deputy chief of staff for part of the period.
sentences.chinese: 而高柏曾有一段時間擔任薩科齊的副參謀長。

sentences.english: But the Deputy Chief of Staff also said Iran will not directly send troops to Iraq.
sentences.chinese: 但副參謀長也稱伊朗不會直接派兵援助伊拉克。

sentences.english: Chief of the General Staff Chen Bingde held talks with him.
sentences.chinese: 陳炳德總參謀長與他舉行了會談。

sentences.english: President Lee held a meeting with the Joint Chiefs of Staff in Seoul.
sentences.chinese: 韓總統李在首爾舉行了參謀長聯席會議。
